sentence.text: The student's t-test was used to compare FOXP1 expression in the tumour and the adjacent normal tissues.
There was a significantly higher expression level of FOXP1 in the tumour than in the adjacent normal tissue (0.0052 ± 0.0021 vs 0.0027 ± 0.0018, P AAAA 0.001).
Patients with genotype AA were found to have remarkably higher FOXP1 expression in the tumour than those with genotype CC (P = 0.01).
